summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5800 for the improvement of Airport Way, from Spokane Street to Vermont Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks, widening existing pavement, and other improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76470, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
